document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2007-02
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, AMENDING TITLE 10 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON VEHICLES AND TRAFFIC CODE BY ADDING SECTION 1107.008.AND 1108.008.THERETO, PROVIDING FOR THE COLLECTION OF AN ADMINISTRATIVE FEE FOR THE TOWING OF VEHICLES UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS AND ORDERED BY THE AMERICAN CANYON POLICE DEPARTMENT, AND AMENDING TITLE 10 BY ADDING SECTION 10.08.190 THERETO, PROVIDING PROVISIONS FOR A REIMBURSEMENT OF FEES UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS.
